short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that scans and analyze SEO elements of the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Checker Tool is a versatile Chrome extension that helps you optimize your webpage for search engines. It provides an in-depth analysis of essential SEO elements, including heading structures (H1-H6), meta tags, images, and links. Perfect for webmasters, SEO professionals, and content creators, this tool ensures your site meets SEO standards and provides a seamless user experience.

Features

1. Heading Structure Analysis (H1-H6)
Detects all headings (H1-H6) on the page and checks for proper hierarchy and usage.
Ensures no missing or duplicate H1 tags for optimal SEO performance.
2. Meta Tag Checker
Analyzes critical meta tags such as robots, viewport, title, and meta description.
Flags missing or improperly configured meta tags.
3. Title and Meta Description Display
Displays the webpage's title and meta description for quick evaluation of their relevance and length.
Highlights areas where optimization is needed.
4. Image Attribute Audit
Identifies images without alt attributes, helping ensure accessibility and improved SEO.
Provides a clear list of non-compliant images for easy updates.
5. Link Attribute Checker
Detects links without titles or those with missing rel attributes.
Helps optimize link usability and compliance with SEO best practices.

Benefits for Users

Webmasters: Quickly audit and fix structural and metadata issues.
SEO Specialists: Ensure all critical elements align with search engine guidelines.
Content Creators: Maintain high content quality and accessibility.

How to Use

1. Open the webpage you want to analyze.
2. Click the SEO Checker Tool icon in the Chrome toolbar.
3. Click SEO Analyze button and wait for the extension to scan the page.

Review the results, which include:
1. A detailed heading structure (H1-H6).
2. Status of critical meta tags like robots and viewport.
3. The pageâ€™s title and meta description.
4. A list of images missing alt attributes.
5. Links without titles or rel attributes.

Why Use SEO Checker Tool?

This tool simplifies the process of identifying SEO issues and provides actionable insights to optimize your website effectively. With its focus on critical SEO components, you can ensure your site meets industry standards and provides an excellent user experience.

Support & Feedback

For support or suggestions, contact us at support@genelify.com. We value your feedback and are committed to enhancing your experience with the SEO Checker Tool.
